sets.name: Balance of Terror OP Special Build Cards
sets.comment: These faux-cards cover the special rules for the Balance of Terror OP

upgrades.name: Balance of Terror
upgrades.text:
This card adds an extra [talent] slot which applies the special rules from the Balance of Terror OP.

The chosen Upgrade will be placed face down below your ship card for a cost of exactly 3 SP. The Upgrade must be of the same faction as the ship and have an SP cost of 5 or less.
